short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically rotate through open tabs with customizable intervals and settings.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Resolver - Tabs PLUS is a browser extension that automates tab switching within a single window. Itâ€™s designed to help users stay organized by rotating through open tabs at customizable intervals.

Features:
Automatic Tab Rotation
Switch between open tabs automatically, using intervals you set. This helps you keep track of multiple web pages without manual intervention.

Customizable Intervals
Set a global rotation interval for all tabs or customize intervals for specific URLs. This flexibility allows you to focus on the content that matters most.

Smart Reload
Choose to refresh tabs as they rotate, ensuring you see up-to-date information. Select which tabs should refresh automatically based on your needs.

Pause on Inactivity
The extension pauses tab rotation when you are inactive, resuming when you return. This feature helps conserve resources and maintains focus on active work.

No-Reload List
Exclude certain URLs from being reloaded during tab rotation. This option is useful for protecting sensitive data or avoiding disruptions on specific pages.

Status Indicator
A color-coded icon lets you know the extension's status: green for active, yellow for paused, and red for stopped.

Privacy-Focused
Resolver - Tabs PLUS operates entirely within your browser. It does not collect or transmit any data, ensuring your privacy.

Who Benefits from Resolver - Tabs PLUS:
Developers: Monitor multiple tools and dashboards efficiently.
Researchers: Manage several sources of information easily.
Social Media Managers: Stay updated across different platforms.
Anyone: Improve your productivity by automating tab management.
Free to Use

Download Resolver - Tabs PLUS and enhance your browsing experience.
